data.quote: Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: All of us do not have equal talent. But , all of us have an equal opportunity to develop our talents.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: A dream is not that which you see while sleeping, it is something that does not let you sleep.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: I was willing to accept what I couldn’t change.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Man needs difficulties in life because they are necessary to enjoy success.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: The best brains of the nation may be found on the last benches of the classroom.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam

data.quote: Winners are not those who never fail but those who never quit.
data.author: APJ Abdul Kalam
